title: Deuteronomy Week 3 with Dr. George Grant
description:
In this week’s episode, Raechel and Amanda sit down with pastor, author, and long-time friend, Dr. George Grant, for the third week in our study of Deuteronomy. Together with our hosts, Dr. Grant explores the topic of grace, and how Christ did not come to abolish the law, but to fulfill it perfectly so that we can live a life of obedience. Listen along as we read about God’s desire for His children to flourish by embracing what is right and good and true. 

Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 3 of the She Reads Truth Deuteronomy reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Deuteronomy collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/deuteronomy-week-3-with-dr-george-grant
